game.name: DCS: CH-47F
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: The CH-47F Chinook fondly referred to as ‘The Hook’ by US military personnel, stands as the premier multi-mission rotary wing aircraft in use with the US Army, US Army Reserve, National Guard and 20 other nations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The CH-47F Chinook fondly referred to as ‘The Hook’ by US military personnel, stands as the premier multi-mission rotary wing aircraft in use with the US Army, US Army Reserve, National Guard and 20 other nations.
